channel.title: Getting started on Introduction to Shiny
channel.description: Recent content in Getting started on Introduction to Shiny

item.title: Getting started
item.description: Chapter 1 Getting started with Shiny Creating a Shiny app The most straightforward way of creating a new Shiny app is to use R Studio. From the menu, choose, File, New, Shiny Web App. Choose a suitable name for your app (e.g. “gapminder”). Leave the other options as their defaults (“Single File”, and Create within directory: ~/mawdsley). 01_defaultapp When we create a new Shiny app we can create a single file (app.
